| History                 = The Rossi crime family hired [[Bullseye (Lester) (Earth-616)|Bullseye]] to take out the [[Patrillo Crime Family (Earth-616)|Patrillo family]]. He decimated the family, though it was thought that the [[Frank Castle (Earth-616)|Punisher]] was responsible. In fear the last mob boss [[Fonzie Patrillo (Earth-616)|Fonzie Patrillo]] remained under the Punisher's radar, by living as a cross-dressing suburban. Twenty years after the decimation, Bullseye killed the remaining members of the Patrillo crime family. Leaving the territory to be taken over by the Rossi crime family.{{r|Punisher vs. Bullseye Vol 1 1}}{{r|Punisher vs. Bullseye Vol 1 5}}
